info.name: Roblox Modern
info.description: Open-Source Style that flattens the old buttons on the roblox website. This does NOT work with the OBC theme, nor any other themes. Check out my other theme! https://userstyles.org/styles/141151/roblox-snivy-theme
info.additionalInfo:
2.2 [5/30/2017]
-Added siggy
2.1 [5/21/2017]
-Emergency fix for a domain issue. www.roblox.com users rejoice!
2.0 [5/5/17]
-Code Reorganized/Rewritten
-New Changes To Tabs
-Code is now OPEN SOURCE! Use this code to start building your own Roblox theme as long as you credit me!
-Tutorials within comments explaining how these selectors work for people looking to see how this code works.
1.0 [5/4/27]
-Initial Release.

data.title: Doesnt work like it used to!
Doesnt work like it used to!
